label: RequestingParty
comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role as a requestor.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the access rights, such as unlimited, restricted, prohibited, for this requesting party.
The unique Business Entity Identifier (BEI) as defined by ISO 9362 (Banking telecommunication messages, Bank Identifier Codes) for this requesting party.
The textual description of this requesting party.
The unique identifier for this requesting party.
A code specifying a language for this requesting party.
The name, expressed as text, for this requesting party.
The code specifying the type of requesting party.

objectProperties.comment: The financing financial account, used for managing the line of credit, specified for this requesting party.
The creditor financial account, used for crediting, specified for this requesting party.
A proprietary identity specified for this requesting party.
The project organization, such as a business or government body, for this requesting party.
The project person specified for this requesting party.

referencedBy.comment: The requesting party specified in this financing request document.
